subject: Business
title: Risk Tolerance: Know Your Comfort Zone
description: One-minute skill: Risk Tolerance: Know Your Comfort Zone.

hook.text: The market drops 30%. One investor panics and sells. Another buys more. Same event, opposite reactions.

buildup.text: Risk tolerance is how much investment loss you can handle financially and emotionally without making rash decisions.

discovery.text: Age, income stability, time horizon, and personality all affect risk tolerance.

twist.text: Most people overestimate their risk tolerance in bull markets and discover their real tolerance during crashes.

climax.text: The right portfolio is one you can hold through a 50% crash without selling. If you'd sell, you have too much risk.

punchline.text: Know your tolerance before the storm, not during it.

quiz.question: When do most people discover their true risk tolerance?
options: During market crashes when they feel the urge to sell
When filling out a risk questionnaire
When their portfolio is performing well
